item.title: Handy Commands for plasma py repo
item.description: Setup and debug python3 -m pip install -e .[all] #Install changes-to be done from root dir pytest # To run all test pytest -k <Name> #Run a specific test Contribution tips! 1. Add Changelog entry per PR 2. Make sure a test is return for a feature
